title: Journey together
brief_description: Feature documentary about the training of two young RAF air-crewmen in Britain and America, during World War II, one of whom becomes a pilot and the other, after many trials and tribulations, a navigator. Stars Richard Attenborough, Jack Watling, Edward G. Robinson, Rex Harrison, George Cole.
